name: Dream Escape (itch) (WigHz, Xandruher, sfeldman, Ryokugin)
description:
Discover the secrets of your dream!

Godot Wild Jam 55 Entry with the Theme "Dreams"

Controls:
Mouse Left Click to throw the Orb or temporary increase its pull
Mouse Right Click to retrieve the Orb

Team:Ryokugin (Game Design and Development)
Sfeldman (SFX and Music)
WigHz (VFX and Development)
Xandruher (3D Art)

References:
Vaporsthetic Color Palette
Monoton Font
Orbitron Font
